properties.description: Cyfeiriad: 275 High Street, Bangor, Gwynedd Côd Post: LL57 1UL Rhif Ffôn: 07799502374 E-bost: dylan@samaki.co.uk Dyddiau ac Oriau agor: Mon to Sat 09:00 to 17:00, Sunday 11:00 to 16:00 Beth fydd ar gael yn rhan o’ch “Croeso Cynnes”?: Defnydd o stafell gynnes / The use of a warm room, Paned / Warm Beverage, WIFI Unrhyw fanylion pellach?: Our intention is to promote the space as a warm room, with a beverage, during the last two hours of opening from Mon to Sat, then during the last hour on Sunday. In the event that there is any spare food, this will be given to those making use of the space as we are a working restaurant. Beyond this the location also offers a food bank, community fridge, and food bank. All of these will be promoted and made available to those using the space, as will access to specialist support services administered through North Wales Recovery Communities, the parent charity that established Bwyd da Bangor in 2021.

hours._text: Mon to Sat 09:00 to 17:00, Sunday 11:00 to 16:00
